t: Amazon.com : Candy Corn Bulk : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Candy Corn was invented in 1880 by an employee of the Wunderlee Candy Company named George Renninger. The first Candy Corns were expensive, as each colored layer was poured into a mold by hand. Fortunately, times have changed. Now, you can get this American classic in bulk and a great price!
